Text.val: 06.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
28.02.2012 SH SCR17053 Added Information barrier (e.g. pi.SQL_MQDT_ADMNO)
29.08.2008 SH SCR13911 Extended argument list of OMQ198A
... unlock MQDT(active user) --> only if not already deleted in ODC001BNL
... unlock MQDT(active user) --> only if not already deleted in OMQ198A
... only if MQDT row still exists, could be deleted by another user and current
user didn't moved the cursor from parked row
... lock not possible because locked by another user or MQDT is already deleted

ExpSyntax.val: (ISNULL ({0,23}) OR {0,23}='' OR {0,23}=User (0)) AND NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE)) AND InStr ({1,8},'M')>0
